title: Harambee, the world of the award
creator_credit: Lion Pacesetter Films, Robert Angell and Stephen Cross
brief_description: The Duke of Edinburgh’s Award Scheme is Commonwealth wide and it operates in forty countries. This film epitomises the spirit of the Award Scheme as shown in Kenya in 1971 when Gold Award winners from sixteen different countries gathered to learn, work and explore together.
creator_credit_for_label: Lion Pacesetter Films, Robert Angell and Stephen Cross
